content: दायः [दा भावे-घञ्] {@--1@} A gift, present, donation; रहसि रमते प्रीत्या दायं ददात्यनुवर्तते <ls>Māl. 3. 2</ls>; प्रीतिदायः <ls>Māl. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 199.</ls> {@--2@} A nuptial present (given to the bride or the bridegroom). {@--3@} Share, portion, inheritance, patrimony; अनपत्यस्य पुत्रस्य माता दायमवाप्तुयात् <ls>Ms. 9. 217</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">77</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">164</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">203.</ls> {@--4@} A part or share in general. {@--5@} Delivering, handing over. {@--6@} Dividing, distributing. {@--7@} Loss, destruction. {@--8@} Irony. {@--9@} Site, place. {@--10@} Alms given to a student at his initiation, &c.
